General.Name: Inno Holdings Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Inno Holdings Inc., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, markets, and sells steel-based construction technologies in the United States. The company offers cold-formed steel framing; a mobile factory for off-site equipment rental, sales, service, and support; castor cubes; and prefabricated homes. Its products are used in residential, commercial, industrial, and infrastructure projects. The company also provides research, consulting, incorporation assistance, training, market research, and business development guidance services. Inno Holdings Inc. was founded in 2019 and is based in Brookshire, Texas.
General.Address: 2465 Farm Market 359 South, Brookshire, TX, United States, 77423
